resources.description: Get current and historical data for Brazilian stocks, indexes, or ETFs including price quotes, financial statements, and dividends. Returns real-time quotes, historical prices, financial statements, and dividends for B3 (Brazilian Stock Exchange) tickers.

queryParams.dividends: Include dividend data: true/false (default: false) (string, optional)
queryParams.interval: Historical data granularity: 1d (daily), 1wk (weekly), 1mo (monthly). Intraday: 1m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 60m. Requires range parameter (string, optional)
queryParams.modules: Financial data modules (comma-separated): summaryProfile, balanceSheetHistory, balanceSheetHistoryQuarterly, defaultKeyStatistics, incomeStatementHistory, incomeStatementHistoryQuarterly, financialData, cashflowHistory, cashflowHistoryQuarterly (string, optional)
queryParams.range: Historical data period: 1d, 5d, 1mo, 3mo, 6mo, 1y, 2y, 5y, 10y, ytd, max (string, optional)

results.description: Array of stock quotes with price, volume, and financial data

resources.description: Request a recommended move for an American checkers position. POST JSON { "pdn": "<PDN position>", "depth": optional integer 1-12 (default 8) }. Response includes the best move in long notation and evaluation metadata.

accepts.description: Request a recommended move for an American checkers position. POST JSON { "pdn": "<PDN position>", "depth": optional integer 1-12 (default 8) }. Response includes the best move in long notation and evaluation metadata.

depth.description: Search depth override between 1 and 12. Higher depth increases accuracy and latency. Numeric strings are coerced if provided.

pdn.description: Checkers position in PDN/FEN short form (e.g. W:W31,32:B1-4). Prefix selects side to move, use K for kings.

bestMove.description: Suggested move in long algebraic notation (e.g., 22x17x10).

depth.description: Search depth used for the analysis.

evaluation.description: Evaluation in hundredths of a man from the side to move.

pdn.description: Echo of the analyzed PDN position.

principalVariation.description: Principal variation predicted by the engine.

resources.name: CDP Facilitator
resources.description: Best-in-class x402 facilitator. Fee-free USDC settlement on Base Mainnet. KYT/OFAC checks on every transaction.

resources.name: Corbits
resources.description: A production grade facilitator which supports multi-network, multi-token, multi-payment schemes.

resources.name: Mogami facilitator
resources.description: A free, developer-focused, production-ready facilitator for x402 payments. Use it instantly online, or launch your own Docker image in seconds.

resources.name: OpenX402.ai Facilitator
resources.description: The first permissionless, gasless and omnichain x402 facilitator that any x402 server can use without login

resources.name: PayAI Facilitator
resources.description: Accept x402 payments on all networks including Avalanche, Base, Polygon, Sei, Solana, and more! Get started in less than 1 minute. Supports all tokens. No API Keys required.

resources.name: Treasure Facilitator
resources.description: Treasure x402 Facilitator available on Base and Base Sepolia. Supports EIP-3009 compliant tokens including USDC, MAGIC, SMOL, MIO, AI Frens tokens, and more.

resources.name: WorldFun Facilitator
resources.description: AWE World.fun’s x402 Facilitator enables fee-free EIP-3009 payments in USDC and other ERC-20 tokens, handling verification and settlement on Base so developers don’t need blockchain infrastructure.

resources.name: x402.org Facilitator
resources.description: Default testnet facilitator for x402

resources.name: x402.rs Facilitator
resources.description: Independent, open-source facilitator in Rust. Easy to self-host, extend to new networks, or use via our hosted instance.
